name: Code of Condolence
description:
This game tells the story of a little girl’s mission to celebrate her Grandpa’s life after his passing. You play as ten year old Eve, who must navigate the strange world of adults who are often drunk, and never say what they feel… Can you to fulfil Grandpa’s wish of being remembered with smiles and laughter, instead of tears?

Christian Voigt - Programming
Ruth Mariner - Art, Design and Writing
Sarah Fartuun Heinze - Art, Design and Audio
Georg Marth - Programming
Torbjørn H. Arnesen - Music
